testsuite.name: Test Amazon search functionality

testcase.name: As a Customer when I search for Alexa, I want to see if third option on the second page is available for purchase and can be added to the cart.

failure.message: org.openqa.selenium.TimeoutException: Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of element located by By.xpath: //input[@id='add-to-cart-button'] (tried for 10 second(s) with 500 milliseconds interval)
